body_html: @fmassa copy is something we definitely will need to tackle. I'm not sure if that is something to be done next or if it's better to continue working on vectorization (using SLEEF or MKL VML). For now I'm tending towards the vectorization, since the gains are very immediate and relatively easy in comparison to copy, which will very likely be a pretty lengthy endeavor.
